item.title: AIOTSummary
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 智能物联网（AIoT）是2018年兴起的概念，指系统通过各种信息传感器实时采集 各类信息（一般是在监控、互动、连接情境下的），在终端设备、边缘

item.title: boneConductor
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 骨传导扬声器也称为振动扬声器，其通过产生与声音信号相同频率与相应幅度的机械振动，推动人体组织与骨骼，从而刺激耳蜗中的听觉神经，使人听到声音，

item.title: Federated Learning Introduce
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. 背景 数据孤岛问题严重，由于安全问题、竞争关系和审批流程等因素，数据在行业、甚至是在公司内部以“孤岛”的形式存在。 重视数据隐私和安全已经成为

item.title: Federated Learning Record
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: level: author: , Anit Kumar Sahu(Bosch Center for AI) date: 2019 Paper: Federated Learning Summary discuss the unique characteristics and challenges of federated learning, providing a broad overview of current approaches, and outline several directions of future work that are relevant to a wide range of research communities. Research Objective Application Area: learning sentiment, semantic location, activities of mobile phone users, adapting to pedestrian behavior in autonomous vehicles, predicting health

item.title: RadarLesson
item.author: LiuDongdong
item.description: Transmitter: The radar transmitter produces the short duration high-power rf pulses of energy that are into space by the antenna. Duplexer: The duplexer alternately switches the antenna between the transmitter and receiver so that only one antenna need be used. This switching is necessary because the high-power pulses of the transmitter would destroy the receiver if energy were allowed to enter the receiver. Receiver:The receivers amplify and demodulate the received

item.title: RFID Location Based Service

item.title: NBIOT 调研
item.author: LiuDongdong
item.description: 1. background Low power wide area network (LPWAN) has become an exciting new trend in the development of the wireless communication system since it was first proposed as a class of wireless technology used for machine-to-machine (M2M) or Internet of Things (IoT) communications in 2013。（ such as LTE-M, weightless, SigFox, LoRa, and Narrowband Internet of Things (NB-IoT)）
